1.word: Good morning, students. This is your vice principal, Ms. Morris. I want to inform you that each class period will be reduced from 50 minutes to 40 minutes next Tuesday. Due to the parent-teacher conferences that will be held on that day, school will end one hour earlier than usual. You’ll still take the same classes that you normally would on that day. The starting and ending bells will ring according to the reduced class time schedule. Once again, please keep in mind that next Tuesday’s class periods will be shortened by 10 minutes each. Thank you.
1.question: 다음을 듣고, 여자가 하는 말의 목적으로 가장 적절한 것을 고르시오
options: 학교 행사 후 교실 정리 정돈을 당부하려고

1.word: Man: Honey, I was thinking about asking our daughter to sign up for drama camp this winter. What do you think? Woman: Hmm. Why do you want her to participate in drama camp? Man: I think drama camp is helpful for gaining diverse perspectives. Woman: How will the camp help her with that? Man: In the camp, she’ll play different types of characters. This can help her seethings from others’ perspectives. Woman: That makes sense. Man: Also, she’ll be expected to listen to other kids while collaborating with them. Woman: Oh, that could help her broaden her views. Man: Right. So, participating in drama camp is helpful for obtaining various perspectives. Woman: Okay. Then let’s suggest it to her.
1.question: 대화를 듣고, 남자의 의견으로 가장 적절한 것을 고르시오
options: 드라마 캠프 참여는 다양한 시각을 갖는 데 도움이 된다.
원만한 교우 관계를 위해 친구의 말에 귀 기울여야 한다.
드라마에는 독특한 개성을 가진 등장인물이 필요하다
좋은 연기를 하려면 다른 사람과의 협력이 중요하다
드라마 캠프는 효율적인 여가 시간 활용 수단이다.

1.word: Hello, viewers! I’m Kate and welcome back to my channel, Art Pier 25. Have you ever felt like you couldn’t understand the artwork in a museum? If so, here’s a simple tip for understanding artists’ work better. Knowing about the artists can deepen your appreciation of their work. Art is often a reflection of their feelings and thoughts. Therefore, by exploring their lives and experiences, you can see what influenced their work. So, the next time you go to an art museum, why not explore the artists’ backgrounds first? Once you know about the artists, you’ll be able to have a better understanding of their work. I hope this helps.
1.question: 다음을 듣고, 여자가 하는 말의 요지로 가장 적절한 것을 고르시오.
options: 예술 작품은 보는 사람에 따라 다양한 해석이 가능하다.
정기적인 미술관 방문은 작품 감상 능력을 높여 준다.
예술 작품을 전시할 때 조명 효과를 고려해야 한다.
지역 사회는 예술가에 대한 지원을 확대해야 한다.
예술가에 관해 알면 작품을 더 잘 이해할 수 있다.

1.word: Hi, Sarah. What are you doing? I’m looking at a picture that I took last weekend. Do you want to take a look? Sure. I see a flea market sign hanging from the tree. I was selling some of my old stuff at the flea market. Oh, I like the crown-shaped balloon the girl is holding. She’s my daughter. Hey, do you remember that stripe-patterned tent? Of course. That’s the one I gave you. Oh, there are three vases on the table. Unfortunately, I wasn’t able to sell them. I guess people weren’t interested in them. Yeah. People were more interested in the speaker on the chair even though it wasn’t for sale. I turned on music to attract customers. I see. Looks like you had a busy weekend.
1.question: 대화를 듣고, 그림에서 대화의 내용과 일치하지 않는 것을 고르시오.

2.word: Hello students, this is Dr. Bennett, your principal. Please listen carefully to this announcement about the schedule changes for next week's Science Fair. The fair itself will be held all day next Wednesday in the gym. However, to accommodate the setup, the gym will be closed starting Tuesday afternoon. Therefore, all PE classes scheduled for Tuesday periods 5, 6, and 7 will be relocated to the outdoor field. Students in those classes, please check the online portal for your updated room assignment. Remember, the science fair opening ceremony begins promptly at 9:15 a.m. on Wednesday, and all homeroom classes will report directly to the gym at 9:00 a.m. instead of their regular classrooms. We look forward to seeing your fantastic projects.
2.question: 다음을 듣고, 과학 박람회 개막식이 시작되는 시간을 고르시오.

2.word: Attention, all library users. This is a reminder from the library administration. Please be informed that the library will have special operating hours during the final exam period next month. From December 15th to 20th, the library will open at 7:00 AM instead of the regular 8:30 AM opening time. However, the closing time will be extended to 11:00 PM, two hours later than our usual 9:00 PM closing. Please note that these extended hours apply only from Monday through Thursday. On Friday, December 20th, the library will close at its regular time of 9:00 PM. Also, remember that group study rooms must be reserved online at least 24 hours in advance during this period. We wish you the best of luck on your exams!
2.question: 내용과 일치하지 않는 것은?
options: 금요일에는 도서관이 평소와 같은 시간에 문을 닫는다.
그룹 스터디 룸은 시험 기간 동안 당일 예약이 가능하다.
도서관은 시험 기간 동안 평소보다 늦게까지 운영된다.
